title: Official Blind Review #1
review_assessment:_thoroughness_in_paper: I read the paper at least twice and used my best judgement in assessing the paper.
review:
The paper presents a method that modifies an output of an arbitrary neural decoder to follow weak supervision. This is done through posterior regularization within an amortized structured variational framework. The method is evaluated on two problems: text generation and unsupervised tagging.

The paper is well written with sufficient details. The experiments are very detailed. I especially appreciate the discussions of the limitations.

Note that the paper is half a page over the limit and should be shortened. That said, I don't see that as being a problem.
